title: Did Amy Connie Barrett say, "Is it called a word that does not constitute a hostile working environment?"
subtitle: Barrett wrote to a team of three judges unanimously in 2019, which upheld the dismissal of the workplace discrimination suit by a black employee who claimed to have called racial seduced by a supervisor.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Judge Amy Connie Barrett, who was nominated to the United States Supreme Court in 2020, once declared that "the designation of N does not constitute a hostile working environment."
